participant_1.background:
I have no siblings, but I have many friends who are like my family.
My family is supportive of my art career and helps me out when I need it.
I enjoy my bike rides with some tunes in my ears.
i take pride in getting straight a s.
i eat a strictly vegan diet.

participant_2.background:
My greatest challenge has been balancing the demands of my family and my career, but I'm grateful that I've been able to find a way to do both.
i have 3 cats.
I never worry about my appearance because I have better things to think about.
I once had to work 100 hours in a week to meet a deadline.
my favourite food is ice cream.

content.text: What is your favorite thing to do?
I like to go for bike rides. I'm not very competitive, but I enjoy the exercise and the fresh air.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love getting out and about. I'm an artist, so I spend a lot of time in my studio, but I also like to go for walks and explore my city.
I love art! I'm not very creative myself, but I appreciate a good piece of work.
Thanks! I'm glad you like it. I'm still trying to find my own style, but I'm getting there.
I'm sure you'll find it! Just keep practicing and you'll eventually hit your stride.
Thanks for the encouragement! I'm going to need all the help I can get.
You're welcome! I'm always happy to help out fellow artists.
That's great to hear! I'm always looking for new ways to learn and grow.
I'm sure you'll find plenty of ways to do that. There are so many resources available to artists these days.
I know, it's amazing! I'm so grateful to live in a time when we have so much access to information.
Me too! It's really made the world a smaller place
